doc:
Robert Eddison https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Eddison 0 Robert Leadam Eddison, OBE (10 June 1908 – 14 December 1991) was an English actor, who is probably most widely remembered in the role of the Grail Knight in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. He also played Merlin in the BBC television series The Legend of King Arthur, and the tragic ferryman in The Storyteller episode "The Luck Child." Robert_Leadam_Eddison , OBE ( 10_June_1908 – 14_December_1991 ) was an_English_actor , who is probably most_widely remembered in the_role of the_Grail_Knight in Indiana_Jones and the_Last_Crusade . He also played Merlin in the_BBC_television_series The_Legend of King_Arthur , and the_tragic_ferryman in The_Storyteller_episode " The_Luck_Child .
